post.body: I had to look out the window...it's sunny, well, right this second anyway. :) Enjoy your day!!
I know it!!! LOL People are crazy
I like it ok, had certs today. My first call was laughable. Poor old lady. LOL
Stepbrothers was great! Did we just become best friends? YUP!
I totally wanna hang out with you tonight!!!
I'm hollering the SAME thing .Today I've become the proud owner of 3 Wii'motes, 2 iPods, 2 DS Lites, PS2 & a keyboard/mouse.
I feel that way when I listen to International Harvester. LOL I love that stupid song.
I think thats the way it should ALWAYS be. Sleep well tonight. :)
You sure can, got to mailbox in your menu bar then New Mailbox. hth
WOOHOO I work for Apple and the wait for these have REALLY made people UPSET!!
Oh my...hope he's ok. Tell him we say get better soon!
hahaha horrid like my typo's. :D
Oh My...I have never seen something so horid. The taco right next to it is a site also.
I know you are so thankful! What a great treat. Thinking I might treat myself soon.
If I called the cops everytime my neighbors dogs barked they would put my ass in jail. :)
Did you call in gay today?
HAHAHA! That would made a sad cookie.
or this guy...http://is.gd/bnMr Ding fries are dooooone.
All soda and treats need to be banned. I see kids with 3 and 4 ice creams at lunch..why are they fat? Oh yeah, that CRAP.
I soooo want that but would need to clean for the cleaning lady. It might be worth it!
Thanks Cathy...but I'm running out of punishments for this one. LOL
Be safe and don't forget the shot glass.
Yay Yay Yay!! There you are!!
YAY you are Twittering!!
At least it's not beer like my dad did with me...it could be worse. lol
Leta might be un-American. lol
Congrats to both of you!! What an accomplishment and the best Christmas present!
If you only knew how slooooow I am! LOL
Saying my prayers for you Kris. Just glad you finally know what you are fighting! You can do this!
Work funny, an Apple "cust" just told a chat agent:..."If you think Chubaka is hairy, wait till you see my Wookie."
I'm thinking I might lose my mind today. Whats for dinner anyway? I need some ideas.
What the hell am I still doing up any why does it take me so long to write an email to my boss?
Apple Customer says: "I WANT A MAC...NOW...IN MY PANTSSSSSSSS!" Don't we all sir??
I'm gonna need a drink after this.
OMG this JTV class is PAINFULto listen to. The talking over eachother and the echo is KILLING me!
RT @eMom is giving away a $500 Kmart Gift Card on her blog - simply comment or tweet to enter : http://urlbrief.com/7dfb6c
How do I get sucked into these make-up reality shows? I love them!
Retweeting @sassysal: looking for some friends! Do it!!
LOL~ Ellen is a hoot. http://is.gd/bcPR
These kids are driving me CRAZY! Take them...PLEASE. Bring them back Monday in time for school. I would be a happy mommy.
Pot roast and potatoes hit the spot, I'm stuffed. In a good way. Now I need cookies to wash down my dinner.
Did you hear that? The sound of me FREAKING while I beat that 8 legged FREAK with my NEW SHOE!!! YeeeeeeeeeeUCK
10 year old forged my sig on his progress report...Juvie here we come!! :(
You know? McDonalds coffee isn't half bad...
Retweeting @RyanSwagar: Elf union says no reduction in hourlies. $73/hr for building rocking horses is insane
Retweeting @RyanSwagar: Breaking News: Santas 450 Billion Bailout in jeopardy.
Retweeting @RyanSwagar: BREAKING NEWS : Santa has proposed an emergency 400 Billion dollar bailout.
OMG Cookies everywhere, and we're not even half done! http://www.flickr.com/photos/reneeeeee/
Wish I could fix everything and make everyone feel better.
Feeling REALLY lazy. Work is the LAST thing on my mind. I gotta snap out of this...8 MINUTS till log in.
Did I really schedule myself from 11-midnight? Dumb. Dumb. Dumb. Dumb.
How is it possible for a 7 year old to have SOOO much to say? Constint noise machine.
